name: Point Blank 3
overview: Gunbalina (ガンバリーナ, lit. Ganbarīna), released as Point Blank 3 over the United States, is a first-person shooter arcade game, that was released by Namco in 2000; it runs on the company's System 10 hardware, and as its US name implies it's the third (and last arcade) title in the Point Blank series. The Sony PlayStation version features five different modes, Arcade, Endurance, Versus, Party and Training - and, much like in the PS versions of its two predecessors, it was compatible with Namco's own Sony PlayStation equivalent of Nintendo's Famicom Light Gun (or "NES Zapper"), the "Guncon".
